name: System Network Connections Discovery FreeBSD, Linux & MacOS
description:
Get a listing of network connections.

Upon successful execution, sh will execute `netstat` and `who -a`. Results will output via stdout.

steps.name: Check dependency 1/1
steps.description: Check if netstat command exists on the machine

data.command: if [ -x "$(command -v netstat)" ]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;

steps.name: Resolve dependency 1/1
steps.description: Check if netstat command exists on the machine

data.command: echo "Install netstat on the machine."; exit 1;

steps.name: Re-check dependency 1/1
steps.description: Check if netstat command exists on the machine

data.command: if [ -x "$(command -v netstat)" ]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;
